Azerbaijan accuses EU of meddling by criticising treatment of jailed journalistsAzerbaijan's foreign ministry on Wednesday accused the European Union's ambassador to the oil-rich country of interfering in its judicial system after the envoy said he was "appalled" by reports of the way jailed journalists were being treated. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 12:51:00 GMT C6SQZPKSWVN2TNGQ3LAMEUM34E https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/azerbaijan-accuses-eu-meddling-by-criticising-treatment-jailed-journalists-2024-01-17/Reuters世界亚太地区
Macron's economic plan avoids tough budget questionsFrench President Emmanuel Macron steered clear of tricky budget questions about where billions of euros in cost savings will be found when he sketched out his plans for the rest of his term in office. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 12:48:28 GMT MTH2BMY4BBIHLL4BFMIULKYOFM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/macrons-economic-plan-avoids-tough-budget-questions-2024-01-17/Leigh Thomas世界欧洲
Argentina's Milei to meet UK foreign minister, IMF on Davos tripArgentina's President Javier Milei will meet British foreign minister David Cameron and IMF chief Kristalina Georgieva on his trip to Davos, where he is expected to pitch his ultra-liberal government programme in a special address later on Wednesday. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 12:35:26 GMT C2S2H4LMCJO25LMLREV5PXDGPA https://www.reuters.com/world/argentinas-milei-meet-uk-foreign-minister-imf-davos-trip-2024-01-17/Reuters商业达沃斯
Oslo airport closes due to heavy snowfallOslo's main airport closed for safety reasons on Wednesday due to heavy snowfall in Norway's capital region and many train services and other public transport also faced severe delays or cancellations, operators said. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 12:17:08 GMT SKFDHT2SHZJ3XI2IRCG6BGEP2U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/oslo-airport-close-due-heavy-snowfall-2024-01-17/Reuters世界欧洲
Russia got components worth $2.9 bln from West despite sanctions, Kyiv saysWestern companies supplied Russia with $2.9 billion worth of components that can be used for military production in the first 10 months of 2023 despite sanctions on Moscow, the Ukrainian president's office said on Wednesday. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 12:16:26 GMT MTYZA6H3K5KMLI7CORVAWKMZ3E https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-got-components-worth-29-bln-west-despite-sanctions-kyiv-says-2024-01-17/Reuters世界欧洲
Pakistan recalls envoy from Iran after airspace violationPakistan recalled its ambassador from neighbouring Iran on Wednesday after Iran violated its airspace, the Pakistani foreign ministry said, amid unprecedented tension between the two Muslim nations. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 12:10:24 GMT NZIEQWYXRBP23JASDW43B6Q6VU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistan-recalls-ambassador-iran-after-airspace-violation-2024-01-17/Asif Shahzad, Saleem Ahmed世界亚太地区
Italy pushes for quick decision on EU maritime Red Sea forceItaly would like a political decision made to create an EU maritime security mission for the Red Sea by next week so that it can become operational as soon as possible, Italy's foreign minister said on Wednesday. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 12:09:10 GMT IIE26L7FDNJEXMEJDL66FUAMDM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/italy-pushes-quick-decision-eu-maritime-red-sea-force-2024-01-17/Reuters世界欧洲
Jordan says southern Gaza hospital badly damaged by Israeli shelling nearbyIsrael stepped up its assault on Khan Younis in southern Gaza on Wednesday, pushing tanks westwards and prompting accusations from Jordan that its field hospital in the city had been badly damaged by nearby shelling. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 11:45:04 GMT 6K34W3RODJONZNIJMO4NNOIFTY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/jordan-says-southern-gaza-hospital-badly-damaging-by-israeli-shelling-nearby-2024-01-17/Arafat Barbakh, Tyrone Siu, Nidal Al-Mughrabi世界中东
Jordan says its Gaza hospital damaged by Israeli shellingThe Jordanian army's military field hospital in Khan Younis in Gaza was badly damaged on Wednesday by Israeli shelling in the vicinity of the building, and the army said it held Israel "fully responsible for a "flagrant breach of international law." Wed, 17 Jan 2024 11:40:04 GMT YBJAQF26NRKYRO2NSRIP5UDRYY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/jordan-says-its-gaza-hospital-damaging-by-israeli-shelling-2024-01-17/Reuters世界中东
Look beyond profit to heal 'lacerated world', pope tells Davos leadersPope Francis on Wednesday urged political, economic and business leaders at the World Economic Forum (WEF) in Davos to look beyond profit and try to heal an "increasingly lacerated" world with moral and ethical decisions. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 11:28:17 GMT MWRYGM5JLBJXVG5HIGPHZBM6SM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/look-beyond-profit-heal-lacerated-world-pope-tells-davos-leaders-2024-01-17/Philip Pullella商业达沃斯
Blinken says US in demand as he mourns 'gutwrenching' scenes in GazaU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken told business and political leaders in Davos on Wednesday he could not think of a time in his career when there had been more global challenges, ranging from war in Gaza and Ukraine to tensions over Taiwan. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 11:19:03 GMT VGG6ONGLQBKIJP2MPVINFK3LIM https://www.reuters.com/world/us/blinken-says-us-demand-he-mourns-gutwrenching-scenes-gaza-2024-01-17/Leela De Kretser, Alexander Smith商业达沃斯
